attributes.description: This dashboard focuses exclusively on Kubernetes events. Charts show Warning-level events generated across the cluster broken down by source (e.g. pod) and by reason. A separate table lists the events (at both Normal and Warning levels) generated across the cluster. Filters can be applied to to display events only from specified namespaces and/or pods.
